description: The affable, smooth-talking game show host of "Wheel of Fortune," "Love Connection" and "Scrabble" later became a right-wing podcaster.
title: Chuck Woolery, game show host of 'Love Connection' and 'Scrabble,' dies at 83

description: The Alpha Phi sorority and two members of Beta Alpha Omega have been charged after a student was found dead in a river after attending an off-campus party where alcohol was allegedly served to minors.
title: 2 Dartmouth fraternity members and a sorority have been charged in death of a student

description: The Icelandic pop star Björk's new installation at Centre Pompidou in Paris uses animal sounds to help people understand what's lost and what we stand to lose as a result of human-caused climate change.
title: A new installation lets you hear extinct and endangered animal sounds, thanks to Björk

description: The Foldscope brings a powerful science tool to schools that can't afford microscopes. Scientists use it too. Its creators have handed out 2 million units, including a new mini-model for younger kids.
title: Fold paper. Insert lens. This $2 microscope changes how kids see the world

description: An Israeli strike on a Lebanese army center on Sunday killed one soldier and wounded 18 others, the Lebanese military said.
title: Israeli strike kills Lebanese soldier as Hezbollah fires rockets at Israel
